abstract: A district judge ruled that BP should cover some direct damage claims filed against Halliburton, even if the contractor was at fault.
snippet: A district judge ruled that BP should cover some direct damage claims filed against Halliburton, even if the contractor was at fault.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that BP must cover some of the direct damage claims awarded against Halliburton for the $40 billion in cleanup costs and economic losses caused by the 2010 oil well explosion and Gulf of Mexico spill.

headline.main: BP Must Pay Some Gulf Claims Filed Against Halliburton
headline.print_headline: BP Must Pay Some Gulf Claims Filed Against Halliburton
